name: Security Guard Jobs Direct
overview:
Security Guard Jobs Direct is an online resource for finding security guard jobs and information as well as a publisher of advice an articles for individuals within the security services industry.

There has never been a greater need of security personnel in the United States to protect vital corporate assets, facilities, and even the people that occupy them. In fact, a recently released study by Cleveland-based The Freedonia Group says that private contracted security services are expected to rise 5.4% annually to $64.5 Billion by 2016, making it a prime opportunity for those seeking the start of a new career or for those with experience looking to get back into the industry, which is the inspiration for Security Guard Jobs Direct.

Even though there are the typical national job board websites including Indeed, Simply Hired, CareerBuilder, and Monster.com, it can still be difficult to find high quality security guard employment positions. This is where Security Guard Jobs Direct’s exclusive focus on these positions step in to present the best opportunities from the high level opportunity employers.
